entities.name: harry
entities.description: The main character of the story, referred to by his first name. He is described as creeping forward and looking around.

entities.name: hermione
entities.description: Another person in the story, also referred to by her first name. She is described as whispering and squinting at the rows of shelves.

relationships.description: Harry and Hermione are together in the room, creeping forward and looking around. They are described as whispering to each other.
